meanings.definition: To apply paste to something in advance.
meanings.sent1: Before the art project, she was prepasting the paper.
meanings.sent2: I always prepaste the labels on the jars before organizing them.
meanings.sent3: The prepasting process made the craft project much easier to complete.
meanings.sent4: Her method of prepasting the pieces together saved a lot of time.
meanings.sent5: The prepasting step ensured the smooth application of the wallpaper.

meanings.definition: The act of applying paste to something in advance.
meanings.sent1: The prepasting of the labels was done meticulously by the team.
meanings.sent2: I found the prepasting of the fabric before sewing very helpful.
meanings.sent3: The prepasting station in the art room was always a messy sight.
meanings.sent4: The prepasting of the invitations was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The prepasting process was crucial for the success of the project.
